title: Crime Alert 07.30.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 07.30.19
description:
Embezzler Bernie Madoff wants out of jail. Judge denied plea deal for four teens in rock throwing death. Judge say man is too old to kill again and lets him out of jail. He's charged with murder again.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
